name: Red Lucy
storyline:
This is the story of a young man living with his roommate and grandfather.
Life is simple with no worries, but there are still a lot of questions left unanswered.
Why does nobody want to talk about their presumed dead parents?
Why is the neighbor's wife so friendly?
Things are about to take an unexpected turn and secrets will be unearthed for better or worse.
summary: Red Lucy is an adult visual novel with a focus on more mature women and the secrets that they hold. There is a large emphasis on music and art's relationship with the human experience.
